scripts.composer_remove: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 composer.phar dumpauto"
scripts.composer_install: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 composer.phar install"
scripts.composer_update: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 composer.phar update"
scripts.migrate_rep: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan migrate"
scripts.db_update_total: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan migrate:refresh --seed"
scripts.rollback_rep: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan migrate:rollback"
scripts.seed_rep: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan DB:seed"
scripts.seed_rep_one: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan DB:seed AgencySeeder"
scripts.optimized_rep: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 composer.phar update --optimize-autoloader --no-dev"
scripts.dump_autoload: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 composer.phar dump-autoload"
scripts.storage_link: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan storage:link"
scripts.key_gen: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan key:generate"
scripts.cache_config: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan config:cache"
scripts.cache_route: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan route:cache"
scripts.cache_view: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan view:cache"
scripts.cache_clear: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan cache:clear"
scripts.optimize: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan optimize"
scripts.optimize_all: npm run optimize && npm run cache_clear && npm run cache_view && npm run cache_route && npm run cache_config
scripts.orchid_user: ssh j960990@j960990.myjino.ru "cd domains/potapovofficial.ru && php8.2 artisan orchid:admin admin asmi046@gmail.com 123"
scripts.deploy_m: vite build && npm run send_vite_build && npm run pull_rep && npm run optimize_all && npm run chmode
